statements.operations:
{
    let notes := add(0x104, calldataload(0x144))
    let n := calldataload(notes)
    let inputOwners := add(0x124, calldataload(0x164))
    let outputOwners := add(0x124, calldataload(0x184))
    let metadata := add(0x144, calldataload(0x1a4))
    mstore(0x1a0, 0x02)
    mstore(0x1c0, 0x80)
    mstore(0x220, 0xc0)
    mstore(0x260, 0x00)
    mstore(0x280, 0x00)
    mstore(0x2a0, calldataload(0x124))
    mstore(0x2e0, 0x01)
    mstore(0x300, 0x60)
    let metadataIndex := calldataload(metadata)
    let metadataLength := calldataload(add(metadataIndex, sub(metadata, 0x40)))
    mstore(0x00, 0x01)
    calldatacopy(0x20, add(notes, 0x120), 0x80)
    mstore(0x320, add(0xc0, metadataLength))
    mstore(0x340, 0x01)
    mstore(0x360, calldataload(outputOwners))
    mstore(0x380, keccak256(0x00, 0xa0))
    mstore(0x3a0, add(0x40, metadataLength))
    mstore(0x3c0, or(mload(0x20), shl(255, and(mload(0x40), 0x01))))
    mstore(0x3e0, or(mload(0x60), shl(255, and(mload(0x80), 0x01))))
    calldatacopy(0x400, add(metadataIndex, sub(metadata, 0x20)), metadataLength)
    mstore(0x240, add(0x200, metadataLength))
    mstore(0x2c0, add(0x120, metadataLength))
    mstore(add(0x400, metadataLength), 0x120)
    mstore(add(0x420, metadataLength), 0x01)
    mstore(add(0x440, metadataLength), 0x60)
    calldatacopy(0x20, add(notes, 0x60), 0x80)
    mstore(add(0x460, metadataLength), 0xc0)
    mstore(add(0x480, metadataLength), 0x01)
    mstore(add(0x4a0, metadataLength), calldataload(inputOwners))
    mstore(add(0x4c0, metadataLength), keccak256(0x00, 0xa0))
    mstore(add(0x4e0, metadataLength), 0x40)
    mstore(add(0x500, metadataLength), or(mload(0x20), shl(255, and(mload(0x40), 0x01))))
    mstore(add(0x520, metadataLength), or(mload(0x60), shl(255, and(mload(0x80), 0x01))))
    mstore(add(0x440, metadataLength), 0x60)
    let startOfProofOutput := add(0x540, metadataLength)
    mstore(0x200, add(0x320, metadataLength))
    mstore(0x1e0, add(0x3c0, metadataLength))
    let s := startOfProofOutput
    mstore(add(s, 0x20), 0xc0)
    mstore(add(s, 0x40), 0x100)
    mstore(add(s, 0x60), 0x00)
    mstore(add(s, 0x80), 0x00)
    mstore(0x20, calldataload(0x124))
    mstore(add(s, 0xa0), keccak256(0x20, 0x20))
    mstore(add(s, 0xc0), 0x20)
    mstore(add(s, 0xe0), 0x00)
    let notesPtr := add(s, 0x100)
    mstore(add(notesPtr, 0x20), sub(n, 2))
    s := add(add(s, 0x140), mul(0x20, sub(n, 2)))
    for {
        let i := 0x02
    }
    lt(i, n)
    {
        i := add(i, 0x01)
    }
    {
        metadataIndex := calldataload(add(metadata, mul(sub(i, 0x01), 0x20)))
        metadataLength := calldataload(add(sub(metadata, 0x40), metadataIndex))
        mstore(0x00, 0x01)
        calldatacopy(0x20, add(add(notes, 0x60), mul(i, 0xc0)), 0x80)
        mstore(s, add(0xc0, metadataLength))
        mstore(add(s, 0x20), 0x01)
        mstore(add(s, 0x40), calldataload(add(outputOwners, mul(sub(i, 0x01), 0x20))))
        mstore(add(s, 0x60), keccak256(0x00, 0xa0))
        mstore(add(s, 0x80), add(0x40, metadataLength))
        mstore(add(s, 0xa0), or(mload(0x20), shl(255, and(mload(0x40), 0x01))))
        mstore(add(s, 0xc0), or(mload(0x60), shl(255, and(mload(0x80), 0x01))))
        calldatacopy(add(s, 0xe0), add(metadataIndex, sub(metadata, 0x20)), metadataLength)
        mstore(add(notesPtr, mul(i, 0x20)), sub(s, notesPtr))
        s := add(s, add(mload(s), 0x20))
    }
    mstore(notesPtr, sub(sub(s, notesPtr), 0x20))
    let proofOutputLength := sub(s, startOfProofOutput)
    mstore(startOfProofOutput, sub(proofOutputLength, 0x20))
    mstore(0x180, sub(s, 0x1a0))
    mstore(0x160, 0x20)
    return(0x160, sub(s, 0x160))
}

nodes.documentation:
Calldata map
0x04:0x24      = calldata location of proofData byte array
0x24:0x44      = message sender
0x44:0x64      = h_x
0x64:0x84      = h_y
0x84:0xa4      = t2_x0
0xa4:0xc4      = t2_x1
0xc4:0xe4      = t2_y0
0xe4:0x104     = t2_y1
0x104:0x124    = length of proofData byte array
0x124:0x144    = challenge
0x144:0x164    = offset in byte array to notes
0x164:0x184    = offset in byte array to inputOwners
0x184:0x1a4    = offset in byte array to outputOwners
0x1a4:0x1c4    = offset in byte array to metadata
